name: lo.cafe Repository
subtitle: Perfect apps from happy devs
description: welcome to lo.cafe! have a sit, grab a coffee, here's a safe place

apps.name: Winston for Reddit
apps.subtitle: Winston, a beautiful and native Reddit client for iOS
apps.versionDescription:
• Implemented option to toggle visibility of feeds prefixes
• Fixed multis not showing up
• Now compact posts settings will be hidden if the option is not enabled
• Fixed comments context menu preview showing in the wrong size
apps.localizedDescription:
Introducing Winston: 
 A Stunning and native Reddit client for iOS
- In-development, free, and open-source app and bot 
- User-friendly interface designed for easy navigation
- Compliance with Reddit's Terms of Service for a seamless experience
- Stay connected with the Reddit community in a sleek and intuitive way
- Experience the beauty of Winston, your ultimate iOS Reddit companion.

versions.localizedDescription:
• Implemented option to toggle visibility of feeds prefixes
• Fixed multis not showing up
• Now compact posts settings will be hidden if the option is not enabled
• Fixed comments context menu preview showing in the wrong size

• Complete rewrite of how Winston displays the elements in each feed, resulting in a major boost to Winston’s smoothness 
• Fixed bug regarding crossposts in compact mode
• Fixed rare bug causing crashes when  in compact mode 
• Addition of setting to select the comment skipper button location
• Fixed compact mode bug relating to post link heights
• Fixed crashed related to UI being updated in the background
• Fixed bug relating to tab bar swiping
• Fixed bug relating to swipe anywhere

Changelog
• Features and Enhancements
• Implemented account switcher
• Implemented caching for preview models and shared videos
• Reformulated Winston Everywhere to be a React app
• Implemented new credential transition effect
• Introduced custom filters and Core Data support
• Added behavior toggle for audio changes
• Added "Collapse Comment" swipe action
• Finished flairs animation
• Open old.reddit links inside the app 

Bug Fixes and Optimization
• Fixed compact mode links and audio issues
• Fixed issues with account management
• Fixed various bugs in video playback
• Fixed various issues with announcements and voting
• Fixed problems with comment collapsing and links
• Fixed comments loading bug
• Fixed post opening issues
• Fixed issues with post links and hitboxes
• Fixed issues with theme editing and preview
• Fixed problems with comments and voting
• Fixed various crashes and performance improvements
• Fixed issues with feed load times
• Fixed bugs in flairs animation
• Fixed text being duplicated when typing a reply
This release does not have any changes and is only there to fix our AltStore source
This release does not have any changes and is only there to fix our AltStore source

• Huge performance upgrade!
• Implemented saved posts. You can now access the "Saved" tab in your subs drawer.
• Add controversial sort
• Add subscribed indicator / button to search
• Added option to use inline post toolbar in place of floating toolbar in the post page. (Theme •> Post page •> Inline upvote toolbar • at bottom)
• Added ability to sort by only posts or only comments in a user profile. (Click the corresponding karma button)
• Tweaked look of UI in many areas (mainly compact mode improvements).
• Images in comments now open in the app.
• In•app safari support improved.
• Implemented iCloud syncing for credentials.
• Removed deprecated bug reporting functionality.
• Enhanced stability for the video player and made minor performance tweaks.
• Deployed fix for user flairs and new comment indicators.
• Various bug fixes, stability improvements and QOL tweaks.

Added
• Live Text in images
• Whats new Sheet
• Lock the app with Face ID / Fingerprint ID
• Theme Store
• Subscribed indicator / button when searching for subs
• Add settings import / export
• Add line spacing option for themes
• New comments indicator
• Added flairs in comments
Fixed
• "Streamable" videos now working
• Blur nsfw subs when searching for subs
• Default search sort in settings
• Save sort per subreddit
• Save comment search per port
• Support for themable user flairs
• Add theming for load more button
• fix wrong username showing up for comments

Special thanks to rbertus2000, mmynk, Nelson Dane, Zander Bobronnikov and ben•wheeler for contributing to this release!

• Fixed crash when replying
• Fixed crash when importing new themes
• Fixed crash when long pressing on comment
• Fixed random name in exported themes
• Now exported themes have ".winston" extension (zip will continue to work though)
• Sharing zip to winston is now allowed
• ".winston" open in one tap into winston and imports it

This version is the first IPA available for download for people who can't use TestFlight for any reason.
We don't have a versioning system yet as well, so "0.1" is not exactly precise.

privacy.name: PhotoLibrary
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your library to be able to download images.

privacy.name: DocumentsFolder
privacy.usageDescription: Winston needs access to your documents to save/import themes.

news.title: Winston for Reddit is now on Altstore
news.caption: Winston for Reddit is available for easy sideloading with Altstore!
